column1: # Key stick checking scenarios Montreal creates:
# - Poke checks to strip pucks from opponent stick handling in tight spaces
# - Stick lifts to disrupt opponent shots
# - Active stick positioning to intercept passes and deflect pucks
# - Defensive zone stick work to break up cycles and regain possession
# - Neutral zone stick checks to create transition opportunities
# - Forechecking stick pressure to force turnovers in offensive zone
# KEY STICK WORK METRICS EXPLAINED:
# - OZ Stick Checks: Skill-based turnovers in opponent territory (active forechecking
# - DZ Stick Checks: Home zone stick work (breaking up cycles
# - NZ Stick Checks: Neutral zone stick-on-stick plays (transition defense
# - Total Stick Checks: Combined skill-based possession creation across all zones (higher = more effective stick work)
# - Successful indicates precise
column2: well-timed stick work that CREATES TURNOVERS without penalties
